author: Dr15Jones
body:
EDProducers were always removed from Paths when we run convertToUnscheduled.
However EDProducers were not removed from EndPaths. This lead to a problem
when the same EDProducer was on a Path and an EndPath. This would cause the
EDProducer to be removed from the Path but left on the EndPath so the EDProducer
would remain scheduled. If modules on a Path needed the results from that
EDProducer they would fail to get those products.
title: Clean EndPaths as well when going unscheduled
